title: OTel, Elastic Collaborate to Make Observability More Accessible
author: Meredith Shubel
description: Elastic and OpenTelemetry are simplifying and unifying data pipelines to make it easier for people to use observability data without becoming experts.
cntitle: OTel 与 Elastic 合作，让可观测性更易于访问
cndescription: Elastic 和 OpenTelemetry 正在简化和统一数据管道，以便人们更容易使用可观测性数据，而无需成为专家。
